html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals right now, including some popular earbuds, a compact gas detector and some long-lasting home tools, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. If you're looking for N95 and KN95 masks this winter, Amazon also has plenty of choices on sale right now.

► Cloth masks are no longer recommended to protect against the omicron variant:  Here's how to find the best KN95 masks for kids and N95 masks are your best mask option—here's where to buy them online

► Presidents' Day:  Shop the best deals on TVs, appliances and everything in-between

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. 55% off: These long-lasting hand warmers

Keep your palms toasty in the most frigid temperatures with these HotHand hand warmers, on sale today. Typically listed for $12.95, this 10-pack of warmers is more than half off for $5.79. HotHand says the warmers heat up within 30 minutes after shaking them out of their packaging, and are odorless and disposable. Whether you're outside shoveling snow or on a brisk morning run, these can keep heat flowing.

Get the HotHand Hand Warmers Value Pack for $5.79 (Save $7.16)

2. Less than $100: These powerful headphones

Apple's AirPods are one of the most popular headphones on the market, and if you want to give them a try for yourself, now's a great time. The second-generation AirPods are now available for $99.99—37% off their list price of $159. Apple says the buds get up to five hours of listening time on one charge, and the included charging case can add an additional 24 hours of battery life. Apple product users can also get quick access to the Siri smart assistant through the AirPods just by saying, "Hey Siri."

Get the Apple AirPods (Second Generation) for $99.99 (Save $59.01)

3. Save $20: This easy-to-use software

Get a head start on tax season by grabbing a TurboTax Deluxe download card for PC. Normally priced at $59.99, the software kit is now selling for 33% off, or $39.99. TurboTax says the card lets you make five electronic filings of federal tax returns and one filing for state tax returns, and suggests that this particular package is best for homeowners who have made charitable donations and have high medical expenses. You can also import W-2s as well as investment and mortgage information from companies you're including in your filings.

Get the TurboTax Deluxe 2021 Tax Software Federal and State Tax Return PC Download for $39.99 (Save $20)

4. 50% off: This compact home radon detector

It can be difficult to know when and how to check for radon in your home, but this Airthings Corentium home detector can help you stay safe. Typically listed for $199.95, this handheld gas monitor is on sale for $99, or an impressive 50% off. (Radon is a naturally-occurring and common radioactive gas that is can cause problems when its present in homes: According to the EPA, it's the second leading cause of lung cancer.) and Airthings says the detector can easily generate a radon self-inspection report whenever you need to check levels in your home. The display screen shows both long and short-term readings to give you even more information. 

Get the Airthings Corentium Home Radon Detector for $99 (Save $100.95)

5. Up to 49% off: These durable home tools

If you've got home repairs to do this winter, stay stocked with the right equipment by shopping these select home tools on sale at Amazon today. You can get the WorkPro 6-in-1 staple gun available for as low as $23.99 thanks to a 20% discount. The brand says the tool can handle six kinds of staples and nails, and boasts dual power settings to handle jobs with both hard and soft materials. You can also shine a light on the darkest corners of your home with a six-pack of EverBrite 9-LED flashlights, available for 40% off at $10.87. The brand says the flashlights have a beam range of 59 feet and all come in slip-proof cases to prevent damage from drops over time.

Save up to 49% on select home tools

The best Amazon deals from this week 

1. LG OLED C1 Series Alexa Built-in 4K Smart TV

We love the LG C1 OLED TV, and it's now available for its lowest price of the year. We loved the incredible contrast and picture quality this OLED panel delivers, the sheer number of features it offers (including Dolby Vision and a 120Hz refresh rate) and its eye-catching design. If you're looking to invest in the best possible home theater experience, the LG C1 starts for as low as $1,296 in its 55-inch size, a $203 discount from its usual price of $1,499.99. (It's slightly cheaper in its 43-inch size, though not on sale, at $1,096.99.)

Get the LG OLED C1 Series Alexa Built-in 4K Smart TV from $1,096.99 (Save $203 to $903)

2. Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones

Few headphones are as instantly recognizable as the Beats Studio3, and right now you can get your own pair for a great price. Typically listed for $349.95, you can pick up these wireless music machines in two vibrant colors for as low as $199.99 thanks to a 43% discount. We found the Studio3 to be one of the best over-ear wireless headphones for bridging the gap between a flat, studio-like audio profile with more emphasis on bass and a hefty set of ear cups you can still wear on the go. Its W1 chip can pair the headphones with any Apple or iOS device, while the built-in active noise cancelation drowns out annoying sounds like train rumblings and the hums of an air conditioner.

Get the Beats Studio3 Wireless Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones from $199.99 (Save $141.11 to $149.96)

3. Apple 2020 MacBook Air

The 2020 MacBook Air is the best laptop we've ever tried, having wowed us with the speed of its M1 processing chip and near-13-hour battery life on top of the aluminum chassis and Retina screen we loved in the prior MacBook Air model. If you want to experience the power of the Air yourself, Amazon is selling the laptop for as low as $849.99 thanks to a 10% discount on the product page and an additional $49.01 price cut at checkout.

Get the Apple 2020 MacBook Air from $849.99 with coupon (Save $149.01)

4. Apple AirPods Pro

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for under $180 right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $179.99—a $69.01 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $179.99 (Save $69.01)

5. totes Women's Chelsea Ankle Rain Boots

When there's slush on the ground or rain coming down, these totes women's chelsea ankle boots can keep your feet dry in eye-catching style this winter. Typically listed from $55, you can get a pair of these boots in a chic shade of red for as low as $21.48. The brand says the rubber boots are designed to be virtually weightless, slip-resistant and durable enough to handle all types of abrasion. 

Get the totes Women's Chelsea Ankle Rain Boots from $21.48 (Save $20.92 to $33.52)

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Save up to 30% on Amazon Fire TV Omni Series
  • Save up to 41% on Clorox Cleaning Supplies
  • Etekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale from $16.88 (Save $3)
  • Colonel Popper Microwave Popcorn Maker for $17.49 (Save $7.51)
  • Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats from $17.99 (Save $12)
  • Amazon Fire TV Stick Lite for $18.99 (Save $11)
  • Chamberlain myQ Smart Garage Hub and Sensor for $19.98 (Save $10)
  • 7am2m Sonic Electric Toothbrush from $20.99 with coupon (Save $1.35 to $6)
  • Hotodeal KN95 Face Mask 20-Pack for $21.59 (Save $5.40)
  • Bodum Melior Gooseneck Electric Water Kettle from $26.99 (Save $8)
  • WWDOLL KN95 Face Mask, 25 Pack for $28.74 (Save $18.68)
  • Addtam USB Surge Protector Wall Charger Two-Pack for $31.49 with coupon (Save $3.50)
  • Olay Regenerist Retinol 24 Max Moisturizer for $32.94 (Save $20.05)
  • BalanceFrom 40-Pound All-Purpose Weight Set for $34.99 (Save $10.65)
  • Corsair HS60 Pro Gaming Headset from $49.99 (Save $20)
  • KopBeau Space Heater for $64.99 with coupon (Save $15)
  • Philips Norelco Shaver 9100 for $109.95 (Save $40)
  • eufy by Anker RoboVac G30 Robot Vacuum for $229.99 with coupon (Save $90)
  • Tempur-Pedic Queen Tempur Supreme Medium-Firm Mattress Topper for $319.20 (Save $79.80)
  • iRobot Roomba i3+ for $399 (Save $200.99)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
